#summary Introductory page of the Project.

= Personal expense manager =

==What is this project?==
  # This is a learning application, it is meant to be simple and easy to understand. The purpose of this project is to understand and exercise technical java techniques. The business problem that this application models and solves is straightforward and simple.
  # Personal eXpense Manager is a Web Application that is used to manage personal expenses in a simple, straightforward way.

==Business Model==
  # The User of the application has an account. The Account has Debit( money going out) Credit( money coming in). Every account belongs to one user!
  # A user can submit an expense. An expense belongs to an user. It has an ammount of money spent on that expense, ammount that will be debited to one account.
